app_descript:
App Name: ISEKAI: Demon Waifu

Brief:

Embark on a fantastical journey in ISEKAI: Demon Waifu, where you assume the role of a charismatic Demon Prince set to conquer the world and establish your own otherworldly kingdom. Romance beautiful princesses, battle formidable foes, and engage in a game where time and region play pivotal roles in your gameplay experience.

Price:

ISEKAI: Demon Waifu is free to download and play, but some game content can only be accessed through separate in-app purchases which vary in price.
